pullRequest.title: Integration test for secure nodeport service
pullRequest.bodyText:
Integration test for following secure nodeport service  scenarios.


Verifies  a default-admin service is provisioned when a channel called default-admin is added to domain custom resource definition and AdministrationPortEnabled is set to true in WebLogic Configuration


Verifies the default-secure service is provisioned when  a channel called default-secure is added to domain custom resource definition and SSL is enabled in WebLogic configuration.


(1) https://build.weblogick8s.org:8443/job/weblogic-kubernetes-operator-kind-new/1997/  ( all tests passed )
(2) https://build.weblogick8s.org:8443/job/weblogic-kubernetes-operator-kind-new/2090  ( with code refactoring)

nodes.bodyText: There is only test in this class, we don't need test method order
You  can use ADMIN_USERNAME_DEFAULT, and ADMIN_PASSWORD_DEFAULT instead of hard coding it
